sentences.en: "Go easy on him," Sam repeated, opening the door.
sentences.cn: “对他宽容点，”萨姆开门的时候重复道。

sentences.en: "This is Brady Coyne," said Sam, jerking his head in my direction.
sentences.cn: “这位是布雷迪·科因，”萨姆突然转头对我说。

sentences.en: Dianne declared her undying love for Sam.
sentences.cn: 黛安娜表示她对萨姆的爱永远不会变。

sentences.en: Eventually Sam persuaded her to accept an offer of marriage.
sentences.cn: 最终萨姆说服她接受了求婚。

sentences.en: Myra and Sam and the children were driving behind them.
sentences.cn: 迈拉和萨姆带着孩子们开车跟在他们的后面。

sentences.en: Over several hours, Sam explained my assignment, should I choose to accept it.
sentences.cn: 过了几个小时，我的任务山姆解释说，我应该选择接受它。

sentences.en: Sam and I have been together for over a year.
sentences.cn: 山姆和我在一起已经有一年多了。

sentences.en: Sam and John are pulling the rope.
Sam leant over to open the door of the car.
Sam said, "I'm going to hide," and scooted up the stairs.
sentences.cn: 萨姆说：“我得藏起来”，然后匆匆上了楼。

sentences.en: Sam snuggled down in his pillow and fell asleep.
sentences.cn: 萨姆舒服地枕着枕头进入了梦乡。

sentences.en: Sam stood his ground and got a blow that stunned him.
sentences.cn: 萨姆站在原地，被一下打昏了。

sentences.en: Sam was flicking a flashlight on and off.
sentences.cn: 萨姆啪啪不停地把手电筒开了又关。

sentences.en: Sam was left at the dinner table with Peg.
sentences.cn: 萨姆被留下来陪佩格一起吃晚餐。

sentences.en: Sam's mother said her son had a good upbringing and schooling.
sentences.cn: 萨姆的母亲说她儿子家教好，受过良好教育。

sentences.en: There was so much that Sam didn't know yet.
sentences.cn: 还有很多是萨姆当时不知道的。

sentences.en: We sat in Sam's study, among the piles of books.
sentences.cn: 我们坐在萨姆的书房里，身边是一堆一堆的书。

sentences.en: When she had gone Sam and Robina put the children to bed.
sentences.cn: 她走了以后，萨姆和罗宾娜就安顿孩子们上床睡觉了。

phrases.tran_cn: [口]山姆大叔（美国政府的绰号）

trans.tran_cn: 萨姆（男子名， Samuel的昵称）
